thread.title: Uttrakhand Elections 2017: FM Arun Jaitley releases BJP’s vision document in Dehradun
thread.title_full: Uttrakhand Elections 2017: FM Arun Jaitley releases BJP’s vision document in Dehradun

author: FE Online
title: Uttrakhand Elections 2017: FM Arun Jaitley releases BJP’s vision document in Dehradun
text:
Uttrakhand Elections 2017: FM Arun Jaitley releases BJP’s vision document in Dehradun Uttrakhand Elections 2017: FM Arun Jaitley releases BJP’s vision document in Dehradun Uttrakhand Elections 2017: "The focus of the vision-document has been Sabka saath sabka vikas."- JP Nadda By: FE Online | New Delhi | Published: February 4, 2017 4:59 PM BJP’s vision document released by FM Arun Jaitley in Dehradun today. Source: ANI 
Finance Minister Arun Jaitley released the Bharatiya Janta Paty’s vision document earlier today in Dehradun for the upcoming Uttrakhand Elections 2017 that are scheduled to be held on February 15. The document spells out the direction in which the party wants to drive the state. Union Health and Family Welfare Minister Jagat Prakash Nadda was also present during the time of the release. 
JP Nadda took to twitter and said, “ BJP will remove the corruption brought by Congress with its good governance in Uttarakhand.The trust of people ensures our triumph.” While talking about the BJP government’s vision document he said, “Modi Ji’s govt aims to strengthen pivotal sectors i.e. education, health, tourism & agriculture. The document also envisions better structured policies for women and youths. The focus of this vision-document has been Sabka saath sabka vikas.” 
You may also want to watch- 
The Uttrakhand Elections will take place on February 11 for which top BJP ministers including party president Amit Shah , Home Minister Rajnath Singh , Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Finance Minister Arun Jaitley are addressing different rallies at different places in the state.
